column4: Please don't suggest development releases to users, 11.10 is far from stable at this time.
I mean KDE 4.7, NOT Ubu 11.10 (I've just noted the fact that this new KDE goes for both Ubuntus 11.xx).
Still, thats not going to help the fact that the package thats requested here was removed because it was back from the KDE3 days.
